text: Sverre Malvin Stensheim (31 October 1933 - 22 January 2022) was a Norwegian cross-country skier. He competed in the 30 km and 50 km events at the 1960 and 1964 Winter Olympics. He came in fifth place in the 50 km in 1964. Stensheim was born in Oppdal, Norway.
